'''Aimuro''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|An older man hunches over a worktable, scribbling furiously by the light of a flickering lantern. His hair is an oily, matted mess, and his cheeks are streaked with black.

He looks up as you enter, shielding his eyes from the torchlight behind you.}}
Aimuro is the engineer in charge of fort Hasongo and his work has resulted in the creation of an explosive shell, while other endeavors prove promising to the supremacy of the Rauataian navy. He survived Eothas and the naga attack, focusing on the work and preserving it in case something happened to him.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [A Distant Light](/aDistantLight/)
|none            = 
|other           = * He has special dialogue with [Aloth](/aloth/) and [Maia](/maia/).
}}

## =Quests

=
* [A Distant Light](/aDistantLight/): He provides some information on what happened at the fort and points you to an explosive shell. 
[Category:Hasongo characters](/categoryHasongoCharacters/)

Aimuro is the engineer in charge of fort Hasongo and his work has resulted in the creation of an explosive shell, while other endeavors prove promising to the supremacy of the Rauataian navy.
